pr_title: KEYCLOAK-14232 KEYCLOAK-15259 Add Referrer-Policy: no-referrer to each response from Keycloak

timeline.message:
KEYCLOAK-14232 Add Referrer-Policy: no-referrer to each response from Keycloak

(cherry picked from commit 0b49640231abc6e465542bd2608e1c908c079ced)
KEYCLOAK-15259 Avoid using "null" Origin header as a valid value

timeline.bodyText: A more robust way would probably be something like driver instanceof HtmlUnitDriver. But since this is really just a nit pick and it's already merged in -prod repo, let's leave it this way to keep it consistent. ;)
timeline.author: vmuzikar

timeline.bodyText: This change will mean we don't add headers at all if the realm is missing headers
timeline.author: stianst

replies.bodyText: We will. headerValues map is only for values from the realm now. if the map is empty a default value will be used for each header. See https://github.com/keycloak/keycloak/pull/7376/files#diff-a8f44e2e22dfdd252505677da0e5c34aR129
replies.author: mhajas

replies.bodyText: Of course, for some reason I was thinking that was used to loop over what headers to add ;)
replies.author: stianst
